about_the_game:
Amatsuki Mahjong Features

Multiple Mahjong Styles with Real-Time Multiplayer

Amatsuki Mahjong offers cross-platform multiplayer real-time mahjong matches, combining the styles of Japanese (Riichi) mahjong, Sichuan mahjong, Taiwanese mahjong, and Hong Kong mahjong, allowing you to play anytime, anywhere. In addition to challenging ranked matches, the game features casual rooms, friend matches, and more modes, providing mahjong enthusiasts with a rich variety of gameplay options.

Meet Unique Anime Characters with Voice Acting

Encounter a variety of anime characters in the game, each showcasing eye-catching winning animations, stunning illustrations, and quirky themed stickers. With voiceovers in Japanese, Cantonese, and Mandarin by popular voice actors, immersing players in this vibrant mahjong world. Build relationships with your favorite characters to unlock exclusive outfits and more limited voice lines!

Customize Your Mahjong Experience

Mix and match various accessories and winning effects to personalize your matches, making each win feel like a spectacular achievement. Amatsuki Mahjong also introduces themed match scenes, truly bringing the experience to life on the mahjong table for an unprecedented immersive experience!

Easy Learning with Comprehensive Tutorials

New to mahjong? No worries! The game features a user-friendly tutorial assistant that guides you through the rules, winning combinations, and scoring in four-style mahjong. With this support, you’ll go from novice to mahjong master in no time. Plus, automated shuffling, drawing and cutting systems ensure smooth gameplay, enhancing your gaming experience.

Participate in Official Tournaments to Connect and Improve

Join our regular online and offline mahjong tournaments, where players can hone their skills and connect through competition. Participation is free, with plenty of exclusive rewards available, giving you the chance to compete for the top honor of "Tengen Gekka".

Stay tuned on the latest events by following the Amatsuki Mahjong community!
